description: In today's health conscious society people are always trying to figure out new ways to exercise. The truth is that most of the old methods still work just fine. Running is not only one of the oldest forms of exercise, it is also the easiest. Whether you are just starting to jog or are looking for ways to improve your running skill set, Distance Running will broaden your running knowledge and give you the skills to run healthier and longer. Put your runners on and sprint a marathon, whether it’s starting with a mile or jogging on a track, training will be fun using this book. Find your perfect stride today with the Distance Running ebook!
